Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #71 buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?
Buses are rerouted in both directions via Torrance, 100th, and Commercial. 

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?
Buses are rerouted due to utility maintenance at Commercial/103rd.

Headline: #126 Jackson Temporary Reroute near Morgan/Harrison
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Morgan/Harrison, due to street blockage.

Eastbound buses will operate via Jackson,  Racine, Harrison, Jefferson, Jackson, and resume normal route.

Westbound buses will operate via Adams, Des Plaines, Harrison, Racine, Van Buren, and resume normal route.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: No trains between Kimball and Kedzie
ShortDescription: Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Kedzie due to track conditions.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Brown Line service has been temporarily suspended between Kimball and Southport due to track conditions.

As a result, trains are operating only between Kedzie and Clark/Lake at this time.

Shuttle buses are available from Kimball to Kedzie to provide connecting service through the affected area. 

Consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #49 Western, #X49 Western Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Western/Pereshing
ShortDescription: NB 49 Western,  X49 Western Express buses are temp. rerouted via Western, 47th, Western Blvd, Archer and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Pershing.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #49 Western,  #X49 Western Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Western, 47th, Western Blvd, Archer and Western: due to, street blockage near Western/Pershing.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Green Line Delays
ShortDescription: Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Roosevelt. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Green Line trains are running w/residual delays following earlier signal problems near Roosevelt

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
